General.Name: Digital Multimedia Technology Co.Ltd
General.Description: Topco Media Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and sale of various receivers in South Korea and internationally. It offers Android TV, as well as satellite, cable, and IP set-top boxes. The company was formerly known as Digital Multimedia Technology Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Topco Media Co., Ltd. in December 2021. Topco Media Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
